mapper.select: select id, title from cahg_activity_notice ORDER BY create_date DESC limit 0,8

select a.id, a.title, ifnull(d.name,'') as name, date_format(a.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_date from cahg_activity_notice a LEFT JOIN sys_dept d on a.dept_id = d.dept_id ORDER BY a.create_date DESC limit #{page},#{rows}

select a.id, a.title,date_format(a.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_date, a.content, a.file_name, a.file_old_name, a.user_name, a.address, a.time, a.person, a.remark, a.plan, d.name from cahg_activity_notice a LEFT JOIN sys_dept d on a.dept_id = d.dept_id where 1 = 1
and a.id = #{id}
